section.title: Introduction
section.para: The purpose of this document is to describe how to enable @gold_edition@.

section.title: @gold_edition@
section.para:
@gold_edition@ is a comprehensive platform designed to deliver solutions for workforce mobility, BYO initiatives, desktop virtual projects and more. It comprises advanced features such as an SSL VPN and two factor authentication support for en- hanced security and integration to Microsoft SharePoint and Al- fresco. It delivers seamless applications and desktop sessions from Windows and Linux servers to native Windows and Linux clients, HTML5 enabled browsers and mobile devices. A fully featured administrator web console provides for configuration of server settings, user management, application publishing and server monitoring along with server load balancing for optimum performance and scalability.
The @gold_edition@ provides @gold_edition@ features such as SmartCard support and enables users to connect using a @gold_edition@ client. Ulteo provides the following @gold_edition@ clients:
Native Client for Windows and Linux
iOS Client
Android Client
The OVD Gateway is also available as part of the @gold_edition@. For more information on the Gateway, please refer to the documentation on the OVD Gateway

section.title: Installation
section.para: Before installing the Premium Edition, you will need to "switch the system to maintenance mode" in the OVD Administration Console

note.para: The Premium Edition is available for all the supported distributions.

section.para: In order to enable the Premium Edition, an additional package for the Session Manager is required together with a Subscription Key obtained from Ulteo.
